member.name: T:Syngenta.ERMS.ExceptionManagement.Interfaces.IExceptionPublisher
member.summary: Interface to publish exception information. All exception information is passed as the chain of exception objects.

member.name: M:Syngenta.ERMS.ExceptionManagement.Interfaces.IExceptionPublisher.Publish(System.Exception,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Method used to publish exception information and additional information.
member.param: The exception object whose information should be published.
A collection of additional data that should be published along with the exception information.
A collection of name/value attributes specified in the config settings.

member.name: T:Syngenta.ERMS.ExceptionManagement.Interfaces.IExceptionXmlPublisher
member.summary: Interface to publish exception information. All exception information is passed as XML.

member.name: M:Syngenta.ERMS.ExceptionManagement.Interfaces.IExceptionXmlPublisher.Publish(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Method used to publish exception information and any additional information in XML.
member.param: An XML Document containing the all exception information.
A collection of name/value attributes specified in the config settings.
